The Team Behind the Mission

Our international team combines Ukrainian humanitarian workers who've experienced the coordination crisis firsthand, American and European tech specialists, and medical supply chain experts.

Built by Humanitarian Workers, for Humanitarian Workers

This blend of ground-level humanitarian experience and technical expertise ensures we're building a solution that works in the real world, not just in theory.

👨‍💼

Alexis

CEO & Founder

Founded Platforma after experiencing the coordination crisis firsthand while delivering medical supplies in Kyiv.

×
👨‍💼

Alexis

CEO & Founder

Background

Alexis founded Platforma after spending months on the frontlines delivering medical supplies across Ukraine. His firsthand experience revealed the critical coordination gaps in humanitarian logistics that cost lives and waste resources.

Experience

  • 5+ years in international development and humanitarian aid
  • Former medical supply chain coordinator in Ukraine
  • Bilingual (English/Ukrainian) with field experience
  • MBA in Social Impact and Sustainable Development
  • Led emergency response teams during crisis situations

Vision

"Technology should serve humanity's most urgent needs. Platforma transforms how we deliver aid by eliminating inefficiencies and creating complete transparency in every transaction."

Our Values Drive Our Mission

Every decision we make is guided by our commitment to transparency, efficiency, and real-world impact.

🎯

Real-World Focus

Every feature solves a problem we've personally experienced in crisis conditions. No theoretical solutions—only practical tools that work.

🔍

Complete Transparency

Every dollar tracked, every decision explained, every impact measured. We build trust through radical transparency in all our operations.

⚡

Urgent Innovation

Lives depend on efficient coordination. We move fast, iterate quickly, and deploy solutions that make an immediate difference.

Join Our Mission

We're always looking for passionate individuals who want to transform humanitarian aid. Whether you're a developer, humanitarian worker, or domain expert—we want to hear from you.

View Open Positions Get In Touch

Streamlining humanitarian aid delivery across Ukraine through transparent coordination and efficient logistics.
